name: Roulette Statistic 1,60
description:
Roulette is a Statistic which helps you understand which area of wheel or what numbers are to play at the gaming table of any casino.
This is done through an analysis of the numbers drawn where functions and with different complex mathematical analysis is communicated to you in percentage which areas of the wheel or numbers are more likely.
The success of these data takes place at the table thanks to the relationship very Strait between the hand and the movement is instinctive each dealer and the wheel with which
you're playing that impact on the extraction of numbers at roulette.

The application is based on the American Roulette and French, located in every casino.

WARNING ( "This application is not a game, but a software for calculating and
prediction for the game of Roulette ").

Technical Features:
* Calculation & Forecast of the numbers drawn
* Calculation of the Forecast & 8 zones Wheel more likely
* Calculation & Forecast: Areas of default (American, Gold, Silver, Small).
* Calculation & Forecast areas of default (Zero and neighbors, orphans, Series 5 / 8).
* Statistics Snapshots for a quick response on the table.
* Under the request for authorization may be used in real casinos.
